name: Saga of Elsterland: The Destruction Book
name_original: Saga of Elsterland: The Destruction Book
description:
Saga of Elsterland: The Destruction Book is a 2D turn based dungeon crawler's RPG. Enter the world of Elsterland and you are going to have an epic adventure with colorful cast of characters. Manage your team, take the challenge then enter the dungeon.

Explore the lost city with your heroes and gather mighty gear to equip them.
However, there are various monsters in the under world who are brutal and fierce , they will never be soft on you.
Remember, no effort no return.

Features
  • You can create custom team with characters based on classic D&D rule.
  • Solve the puzzle, avoid the trap and you will discover hidden treasure.
  • Provide the role development system and skill tree in depth.
  • Provide both turn based and real-time battle system.
